00783         else if ( ctxLen >= 2 && ctxLen == 3 + ( sCTX.data[ 1 ] & 0x0F )) // Got Frame
00784         {
00785             sCTX.subtype = ctxCkSum ? 1 : 0;
00786             usbOut.Put( &sCTX, sizeof( XPI_IMSG_HEADER ) + ctxLen, 1000 );
00787             ctxLen = 0; 
00788             ctxCkSum = 0xFF;
00789             Goto( IDLE );
00790             }
00791         }
00792     else if ( state == POLL_EIRQ  )
00793     {
00794         sMsg.timeStamp = dTimerTick;
00795         sMsg.type      = XPI_IMSG_TRACE_CTX;
00796         sMsg.subtype   = 0;
00797         sMsg.data[0]   = octet;
00798         usbOut.Put( &sMsg, sizeof( XPI_IMSG_HEADER ) + 1, 1 );
00799         }
00800     else // Ignore octet
00801     {
00802         sMsg.timeStamp = dTimerTick;
00803         sMsg.type      = XPI_IMSG_TRACE_CTX;
00804         sMsg.subtype   = 3;
00805         sMsg.data[0]   = octet;
00806         sMsg.data[1]   = state;

00869                 {
00870                     // Got NACK(): mark board active and continue polling next board
00871                     //
00872                     MarkBoardActive( true );
00873                     PollNextBoard ();
00874                     return;
00875                     }
00876                 else if ( ( octet & 0xC0 ) == 0x40 )
00877                 {
00878                     // Got ACK(): ignore this and continue polling next board
00879                     // Stay in the same state.
00880                     return;
00881                     }
00882                 
00883                 // Got MSG(): mark board active and start receiving data
00884                 //
00885                 //
00886                 MarkBoardActive( true );
00887

00889                 //
00890                 sCRX.timeStamp = dTimerTick;
00891                 crxLen = 0;
00892                 crxCkSum = 0xFF;
00893 
00894                 // Enable EIRQ interrupt
00895                 //

00897                 FPGA_BegWrite ();

00901                 taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00902                 }
00903

00905             
00906             sCRX.data[ crxLen ] = octet;
00907 
00908             crxCkSum ^= sCRX.data[ crxLen ];

00973             sMsg.data[1]   = state;

00141     FPGA_BegWrite ();
00142     FPGA_Write( XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR, 1 ); // Page 1
00143     FPGA_BegRead ();
00144     uint magic = FPGA_Read( XPI_R_P1_MAGIC_LSB ) 
00145                | ( FPGA_Read( XPI_R_P1_MAGIC_MSB ) << 8 );
00146     boardPos = FPGA_Read( XPI_R_P1_BOARD_POS );
00147     taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00148 
00149     // tracef( 2, "FPGA Magic %04X\n", magic );
00150 
00151     if ( magic != 0x11AA )
00152     {
00153         // FPGA is not found and we should left it under reset, just in case.
00154         //
00155         FPGA_SetReset ();
00156         }
00157     else
00158     {
00159         // Set passive mode if CPU-D_ card detected on backplane or user has 
00160         // forced passive mode
00161         //
00162         if ( forcePassive || ( boardPos & 0x30 ) != 0x30 ) 
00163         {
00164             // Are we CPU-D_?
00165             //
00166             taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00167             FPGA_BegWrite ();
00168             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR, 0 ); // Page 0
00169             isMCPU = ISSET( FPGA_Read( XPI_R_P0_GLB_STATUS ), XPI_GLB_MCPU );
00170             FPGA_BegRead ();
00171             taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00172 
00173             fpgaOK = true;
00174             }
00175         else // No CPU-D_ board found on backplane: try to take over bus
00176         {
00177             // Become CPU-D_ (Set MCPU = 1)
00178             // and get board position again
00179             //
00180             taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00181             FPGA_BegWrite ();
00182             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR, 0 ); // Page 0
00183             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_P0_GLB_CONTROL, XPI_GLB_MCPU );
00184             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR, 1 ); // Page 1
00185             FPGA_BegRead ();
00186             boardPos = FPGA_Read( XPI_R_P1_BOARD_POS );
00187             taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00188 
00189             if ( ( boardPos & 0x30 ) != 0 )
00190             {
00191                 taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00192                 tracef( 2, "FP: Something wrong! KA5..4 are not low!\n" );
00193                 taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00194                 fpgaOK = false;
00195                 }
00196             else
00197             {
00198                 isMCPU = true;
00199                 fpgaOK = true;
00200                 }
00201             }
00202         }
00203 
00204     if ( fpgaOK )
00205     {
00206         // Set green LED and clear yellow and red LED
00207         //
00208         taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00209         FPGA_BegWrite ();
00210         FPGA_Write( XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR, 0 ); // Page 0
00211         FPGA_Write( XPI_W_P0_LED_SET, XPI_LED_G );
00212         FPGA_Write( XPI_W_P0_LED_CLEAR, XPI_LED_R | XPI_LED_Y );
00213         FPGA_BegRead ();
00214         taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00215         
00216         // Unmask Interrupts: 
00217         // 1) EIRQ, CRX, CTX, FC: always
00218         // 2) CTXE: only if isMCPU mode
00219         //
00220         taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00221         FPGA_BegWrite ();
00222         FPGA_Write( XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR, 0 ); // Page 0
00223         FPGA_Write( XPI_W_P0_IRQ_ENABLE, 
00224             XPI_IRQ_EIRQ | XPI_IRQ_CRX | XPI_IRQ_CTX | XPI_IRQ_FC
00225             );
00226         if ( isMCPU )
00227             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_P0_IRQ_ENABLE, XPI_IRQ_CTXE );
00228         FPGA_BegRead ();
00229         taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00230 
00231         // Initialize SC transceiver state
00232         //
00233         Goto( IDLE );
00234 
00235         isEIRQ    = false;
00236         isCTXE    = false;
00237         crxLen    = 0;
00238         crxCkSum  = 0xFF;
00239         ctxLen    = 0;
00240         ctxCkSum  = 0xFF;
00241 
00242         ResetPollList ();
00243 
00244         // Enable FPGA interrupt
00245         //
00246         AT91F_AIC_EnableIt( AT91C_BASE_AIC, AT91C_ID_IRQ0 );
00247         }
00248 
00249     sMsg.timeStamp = dTimerTick;
00250     sMsg.type      = XPI_IMSG_FPGA_STATUS;
00251     sMsg.subtype   = 0;
00252     sMsg.data[0]   = fpgaOK;
00253     sMsg.data[1]   = isMCPU;
00254     sMsg.data[2]   = boardPos;
00255     sMsg.data[4]   = xsvf.GetLastRC ();
00256 
00257     usbOut.Put( NULL, 0, 1000 );
00258     usbOut.Put( &sMsg, sizeof( XPI_IMSG_HEADER ) + 4, 1000 );
00259     }

01123             // (but only in if XPI is in IDLE state and able to send data).
01124             //

01150                 // we have to inverse bit at position ( 5 + N ) % 8, where
01151                 // N is the length of packet excluding checksum (i.e. len - 1 ).
01152                 //
01153                 uchar* pCkSum = pRead + len - 1;
01154                 *pCkSum ^= ( 1 << ( ( 5 + len - 1 ) & 0x07 ) );
01155 
01156                 // Re-send the packet
01157                 //
01158                 retry = 0;
01159                 }
01160             else if ( retry < 2 )
01161             {
01162                 taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
01163                 tracef( 2, "SC: CTX Retrying %04x (%d)\n", requestID, retry + 1 );
01164                 taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
01165                 }
01166             }
01167

01169         {

01171             sMsg.type      = XPI_IMSG_FLOW_CTRL;
01172             sMsg.subtype   = ctx_status;

01174             sMsg.data[1]   = requestID & 0xFF;
01175             usbOut.Put( &sMsg, sizeof( XPI_IMSG_HEADER ) + 2, 1 );
